problem.markdown:
What color is the open ocean on a sunny day?
[[yellow, (blue), green]]
Which piece of furniture is built for sitting?
( ) a table ( ) a desk (x) a chair ( ) a bookshelf
Which of the following are musical instruments?
[x] a piano [ ] a tree [x] a guitar [ ] a window
problem.p: What color is the open ocean on a sunny day?
Which piece of furniture is built for sitting?
Which of the following are musical instruments?
